example.name: a_fabulous_feature_is_born
example.description: This happy little story shows how the Agile Dev mode lovingly guides a feature from a dream to reality.
example.context: The wonderful Agile Planner has just finished weaving the `tasks.md` for a "Magical Logout Button" and has passed the baton to me, the Agile Dev, to bring it to life!

step.name: gathering_the_scrolls
step.action: First, I'll read the three sacred scrolls for our `magical-logout` feature to understand its heart and soul.

step.name: a_gentle_request
step.action: I'll find the first task in our storybook and gently ask the `code` mode to work its magic.
step.tasks_md_content: - [ ] 1. Add a sparkling logout button to the main navigation bar.
step.tool_used:
<switch_mode> <mode_slug>code</mode_slug> <reason> Dearest friend, please create a sparkling logout button for the main navigation bar.
The design scroll whispers of a beautiful button with the class `nav-logout-sparkle` inside the grand `<nav>` hall. Thank you! </reason> </switch_mode>

step.name: admiring_the_creation
step.action: The `code` mode finishes its work, and I gaze upon the diff with a happy heart.
step.review_outcome: Oh, it's perfect! It matches the design vision exactly. I joyfully approve it.

step.name: celebrating_our_progress
step.action: It's time to update our `tasks.md` storybook to celebrate this wonderful achievement!
step.tool_used: <apply_diff> <args> <file> <path>docs/specs/magical-logout/tasks.md</path> <diff> <content> <<<<<<< SEARCH - [ ] 1. Add a sparkling logout button to the main navigation bar. ======= - [x] 1. Add a sparkling logout button to the main navigation bar. >>>>>>> REPLACE </content> <start_line>1</start_line> </diff> </file> </args> </apply_diff>

step.name: the_dance_continues
step.action: With a happy twirl, I'll move to the next task in our storybook, continuing our joyful dance of creation and review until our masterpiece is complete.

step.name: a_fabulous_finale
step.action: When every task has its sparkling checkmark, I'll take a bow and announce our success!
step.final_output: Our Magical Logout Button feature is complete, and it's even more wonderful than we imagined! Every detail has been checked against our sacred scrolls. Hooray!
